spiritsExplanation:
The workout is classified under multiple spirits based on various metadata elements. "High-Energy & Intense" is strongly indicated by the terms "HIIT Row," "high-intensity intervals," and the highest intensity level (3 out of 3), coupled with upbeat tracks like those by Logic and Labrinth, leading to a score of 0.9. "Flow & Rhythm" is supported by the description "Move with the beat," suggesting music-driven pacing and coordination, which is why it receives a score of 0.7. The setting of the workout on a river seen in the image aligns with the "Outdoor & Adventure" spirit, scoring it 0.8, as the rowing environment leverages natural outdoor settings.

While structured elements like HIIT could suggest a "Structured & Disciplined" spirit, the description lacks detail about methodical training protocols, leading to its exclusion. Overall, the confidence level is high (0.85) due to the clear indicators provided.
